short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you seamless and secure access to all your web-based learning resources within the School Passport Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your educational experience with the GG4L School Passport SSO extension, offering seamless and secure access to web-based teaching and learning resources. Enjoy the convenience of a single login, whether it's through your username and password or your preferred Identity Provider (IdP), via the School Passport SSO Platform. Elevate efficiency, eliminate the hassle of multiple logins, and embrace a user-friendly approach to educational access
